mapper.insert: insert into INNODB_BUFFER_PAGE_LRU (POOL_ID, LRU_POSITION, SPACE, PAGE_NUMBER, PAGE_TYPE, FLUSH_TYPE, FIX_COUNT, IS_HASHED, NEWEST_MODIFICATION, OLDEST_MODIFICATION, ACCESS_TIME, TABLE_NAME, INDEX_NAME, NUMBER_RECORDS, DATA_SIZE, COMPRESSED_SIZE, COMPRESSED, IO_FIX, IS_OLD, FREE_PAGE_CLOCK) values (#{POOL_ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{LRU_POSITION,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{SPACE,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{PAGE_NUMBER,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{PAGE_TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FLUSH_TYPE,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{FIX_COUNT,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{IS_HASHED,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NEWEST_MODIFICATION,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{OLDEST_MODIFICATION,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ACCESS_TIME,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{TABLE_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INDEX_NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NUMBER_RECORDS,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{DATA_SIZE,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{COMPRESSED_SIZE,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{COMPRESSED,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IO_FIX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IS_OLD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FREE_PAGE_CLOCK,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: select POOL_ID, LRU_POSITION, SPACE, PAGE_NUMBER, PAGE_TYPE, FLUSH_TYPE, FIX_COUNT, IS_HASHED, NEWEST_MODIFICATION, OLDEST_MODIFICATION, ACCESS_TIME, TABLE_NAME, INDEX_NAME, NUMBER_RECORDS, DATA_SIZE, COMPRESSED_SIZE, COMPRESSED, IO_FIX, IS_OLD, FREE_PAGE_CLOCK from INNODB_BUFFER_PAGE_LRU
